report.title: Resource summary for trait
report.description: Breakdown of resources in a trait with species and SQI scores
report.query: with recursive cte_query as ( select t.id, t.term, t.meaning_id, null::integer as parent_id, 0 as sequence from cache_termlists_terms t where t.parent_id=10512 and t.preferred=true union all select t.id, t.term, t.meaning_id, t.parent_id, q.sequence+1 from cache_termlists_terms t join cte_query q on q.id=t.parent_id where t.preferred=true ) select #columns# from cte_query q left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values v on v.int_value=q.id and v.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=17 and v.deleted=false left join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=v.taxa_taxon_list_id left join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=24 left join cache_termlists_terms tc on tc.meaning_id=q.meaning_id and tc.preferred=false group by q.id, q.term, q.parent_id, q.sequence
